reviewText:
Early Access Review

Fantastic game! I really liked this action game!
The graphics are terrific, I really liked the characters,
and the monsters, the general setting is classic fantasy but cartoonish.
The music is terrific too! really good and seems real nes hardware involved!
What I really liked is the option to play up to 3 players, a must-have for a good laugh with friends.
voteText: 3 of 3 people (100%) found this review helpful
